}

    "TopicNum": 200,
    "ZoneId": 450001
}

}

Host: ckafka.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeTopicSyncReplica
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "abc",
    "TopicName": "abc",
    "Offset": 1,
    "Limit": 0,
    "OutOfSyncReplicaOnly": true
}
DescribeTopicSyncReplica.title: Topic 未同步详情

InstanceScalingDown.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ckafka.tencentcloudapi.com

<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "***",
    "DiskSize": 900,
    "BandWidth": 40,
    "Partition": 1000,
    "UpgradeStrategy": 1
}
